title: Covid-19 figures move up with 31 new deaths and 1,254 new cases
content: The Director-General of Health Services has confirmed another 31 coronavirus-related deaths for February 21, pushing the countryâ€™s death toll from the pandemic to 16,055.The deaths reported today include 19 males and 12 females, according to the figures released by the Department of Govt. Information.Five of the victims are between the ages of 30-59 years. Two others were aged below 30 years and the remaining 24 are in the age group of 60 years and above.
